Name: Sergeant Pixel
Description: Sergeant Pixel is a battle-hardened member of the WebtrES club, known for his shiny black exterior that gleams even in the dim light of the digital realm. His screen always displays the classic green pixels that he believes bring him good luck in combat. His buttons and limbs are modeled after a soldier's gear, built for endurance and precision. He has seen many skirmishes against viruses and malware, protecting the club's virtual borders. With a strategic mind and a no-nonsense attitude, Sergeant Pixel is the first line of defense against any threat to the WebtrES community. Despite his tough exterior, he's a beloved leader who carries the memory of every digital battle with pride and honor.
